main.name: Kevin Le
main.description: with a passion to develop products that have real-world impact to customers. My specialty is building web applications that are modern, intuitive, and above all, solve real human problems
main.bio: I'm a dependable, self-motivated Software Engineer with a passion for developing products that have real-world impact. I am most experienced in developing web applications using React & Redux and Flask/NodeJS. I am very interested in recent developments to Computer Science such as AI/Machine Learning and computational vision. I am excited to see how these revolutionary technologies will impact the world in the next decade. If we share any common interests, or if you are interested in contacting me, please feel free to email me below or message me on LinkedIn to chat!

resume.skillmessage: I am well experienced in Web Development and actively learning new developments for the latest web technologies, such as React Hooks. I am always looking for new ways to broaden my development skills and put them to practice.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Major in Computer Science
description: Graduated with Honours, Achieved Dean's Honour Roll in 2018 & 2019

Relevant Coursework: Software Development Methods, Computational Data Science, Web-based Information Systems, Artificial Intelligence, Computational Vision, Databases I & II, UI & UX Design, Computer Graphics, Networking, Cybersecurity

education.degree: Diploma of Computer Systems Technology (Web and Mobile Option)
description: A diploma program that combines computer systems theory with hands-on experience in software development
Relevant Coursework: Object Oriented Programming I & II, Data Structures and Algorithms, iOS & Android Development, Web App Development, Server-Side Web Scripting, Computer Architecture

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Worked extensively with React & Redux to develop features for the front-end team
Automated the workflow processes for all the front-end Git PRs by developing a TeamCity script which resulted in improved team productivity
Developed a feature flagging framework that is used for all the front-end projects
Contributed to daily agile scrum meetings, code reviews, technical documentation, and sprint planning

work.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Collaborated with the product, UX, QA, and development teams to design and develop a feature complete health app in AngularJS
Developed reusable front-end components for AngularJS to be used in future health apps
Designed data models and integrated them with RESTful JSON APIs for the Rails backend server
Unit tested and versioned front-end components on npm

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.category: A React web app used to track stats of the COVID-19 virus

projects.title: Cradle
projects.category: A React web app used to keep track of health readings for maternal mothers in Uganda to prevent maternal death. Currently in the testing phase to be fully deployed in Uganda.

projects.title: Animal-dex
projects.category: A Django web app that hosts information on over 1000 animals. Allows users to keep track of animals they have spotted outdoors.

projects.title: Mystudygroup
projects.category: Platform for students who want to find a study group nearby by utilizing Google maps API. Study groups features real-time chat, file-hosting, and location sharing.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A portfolio website built using React
